body:
```
16:22 < deniz1a> why are travis and make script results different?
16:22 <+Scott`> csc doesn't even warn for a bunch of things
16:23 <+Scott`> travis doesn't use make.cmd
16:23 < deniz1a> but shouldnt they have the same result? then change make 
                 script to match travis?
16:23 <+Scott`> because csc
16:24 < deniz1a> because it cant be done?
16:24 <+Scott`> the compilers are different
16:24 <+Scott`> they behave differently
16:24 < deniz1a> but the compiler on windows cant show unused variables?
16:24 <+Scott`> it's not really up to us to fix this
16:24 <+Scott`> yes
16:24 <+Scott`> it's weird about that
16:24 < deniz1a> oh ok
16:24 <+pchote> Scott`: really? wow
16:25 <+Scott`> pchote: yes
16:25 <+pchote> seems like a weird blind spot for an otherwise awesome compiler 
                to have
16:25 <+Scott`> hopefully roslyn will pick up more things
16:25 <+Scott`> which is like
16:25 < penev> sounds suspicious to me
16:25 <+Scott`> awesome x 2
```
